welcome.title: CROSSFIRE INTELLECTUAL
welcome.subtitle: Competitive Crossword + Cultural Trivia
welcome.multiDescription: Play against a friend online in real-time

tutorial.step1Desc: Tap a word on the crossword and type the letters. If you don't know a letter, tap the HINT button (costs 5 points).
tutorial.step2Desc: After completing a word, a question appears. You can type your answer or tap SHOW OPTIONS to choose from 4.
tutorial.step3Desc: If you answer correctly, you earn double points. If you asked for options, you earn a bit less (x1.5 instead of x2).
tutorial.step4Desc: You and your rival take turns. Reach 150 points to win, or have the highest score when all words are completed.
tutorial.multi1Desc: Choose your name, select categories and tap CREATE ROOM. You'll get a 4-letter code.
tutorial.multi2Desc: Send the code to your opponent. When they join, you'll see their name in the waiting room.
tutorial.multi3Desc: If someone shared a code with you, choose your name, enter the code and tap JOIN ROOM.
